feed.title: Google Cloud: Developer Connect
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Developer Connect

entry.content: Developer Connect now supports HTTP connections, for access to arbitrary HTTP endpoints.
entry.summary: Developer Connect now allows access to arbitrary HTTP endpoints through its new HTTP connections feature. This enhancement expands the capabilities for developers to interact with various web services directly.
entry.title: Feature: Developer Connect Adds HTTP Support

entry.content: You can now connect to Secure Source Manager using Developer Connect.
entry.summary: Developer Connect now supports connections to Secure Source Manager. This new integration allows you to seamlessly connect your repositories hosted in Secure Source Manager. Explore the documentation to learn more about setting up this connection.
entry.title: Feature: Connect to Secure Source Manager
